title: Sandboarding and Off Road in Lima (National Park Lomas de Ancón)
description: No experience is necessary on this sandboarding adventure from Lima. Your guide provides the equipment as well as safety instructions. First, hop inside a 4x4 vehicle for an adventurous, off-road ride to the dunes. This private tour guarantees plenty of individualized attention and assistance. Local sweet treats plus GoPro video and photos are all included.
all_descriptions: No experience is necessary on this sandboarding adventure from Lima. Your guide provides the equipment as well as safety instructions. First, hop inside a 4x4 vehicle for an adventurous, off-road ride to the dunes. This private tour guarantees plenty of individualized attention and assistance. Local sweet treats plus GoPro video and photos are all included.
provider:

Rachel L
6 contributions

A Must Do Adventure Near Lima (safe for Beginners!!)

I had the absolute best time sandboarding in the sand dunes!! One of the biggest highlights of my trip to Peru!! My guide, Annie, as well as the instructors were very patient and encouraging as I had never done something like this before. We progressively got to more difficult dunes and while it was scary at first, I was surprised at how well I was able to pick it up.

I was picked up from my hotel at 7am and requested an airport drop off on the way back, getting there promptly at 1pm. They provided lots of water and fruits as a snack. Annie spoke excellent English and Luis was helpful in demonstrating and carrying everything back up the dunes. They also got some extremely cool videos and pictures of me.

I cannot recommend enough!!!
Written April 6, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Expediciones A
Rachel, thanks so much for such kind review! let us know when you are back to Perú!

Anna M
30 contributions

We had the Dunes to ourselves!

This was one of the highlights of our 2.5 week trip all over Peru! I almost booked in Huacachina however it didn’t work out with our schedule and I am SO GLAD it didn’t! Not only did we have a private lesson and the gorgeous dunes of Ancon all to ourselves (which was incredible), but we ran into other travelers who said the Huacachina dunes were over crowded. This location was magical, close to Lima, and our instructor, Aldo, was fantastic. He was super patient with us, had a great sense of humor, and took so many amazing videos and photos (which was another amazing perk!). Our driver, Carlos, was also amazing and was super competent with how to navigate the dunes. Aldo has a lot of pride for his beautiful country and also does a lot for the youth in his community, which was great to hear about.

An 11/10 experience all around.
Written January 5, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Expediciones A
Anna, it was a fantastic day out in the dunes of Lima. We are so glad to get to meet you guys! we wish you the best. And we can wait to have you back in Peru´s Amazon soon !
Written January 6, 2025
This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.

cloudrest
Philadelphia, PA74 contributions

The best way to engage with the desert landscape

We had half a day with Aldo and Eddie on the dunes north of Lima. The experience was just extraordinary. Aldo taught us (a family of four with two boys 13 and 10) how to sand board. We’ve never done any snowboarding or surfing or anything like this before, Aldo was very patient and you can tell he has a lot of experience working with kids. His passion for the sport is also contagious. The dunes were beautiful, especially during the hours near sunset. And we had it all to ourselves. When our SUV drove off the road into the dunes it really felt like an adventure. In the end we could somewhat make our way down the halfpipe, a large sand structure deep in the wilderness.

Our flight into Lima was delayed and so our experience was cut short. We didn’t have time lunch and had to go straight to this activity after getting off our flight. Aldo got us sandwiches so that we could have energy. We really appreciated that.
Written September 1, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Expediciones A
thank you guys for your visit to Peru, we loved the time we spent in the desert, hoping to have you again in the coming future.

Amazing.

Jun 2023 • Solo
Amazing guide and incredible experience. Picked me up at the airport and there was a couple along with myself that rode in the back row of the SUV. Gave great instructions. Be prepared to fall and get slightly injured. I was going too fast when I basically ate it and rolled over. Was sore for a few days but definitely worth it.

This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.
Joshua
Kenneth City, FL15 contributions

More than an experience, a life changinging adventure.

I came to Lima last on my trip, and initially, I felt like I should have put more days in Cusco. Alonso, Sebastian, and Rolando changed my mind. I had such a fantastic time. Alonso and Sebastian picked me up promptly at my hotel, where we then traveled to pick up my instructor Rolando. Everyone was super friendly and were joking and laughing the whole way to the sandboarding experience.
Alonso is an excellent driver who knows the dunes well. If you have never been off roading before, do not worry. You are in good hands. Alonso is very experienced.
Once out in the dunes, Rolando helped familiarize me with the equipment and assessed my experience level. He was very patient and explained everything I would need to know as a complete newbie. He very quickly had me up and practicing on some small dunes, encouraging me the whole way. By the end, he successfully had me board down a 100m dune! At all times, he made sure I was comfortable with whatever dune we were about to ride.
The ride back was just as fun as the ride out, and we even went through the flavellas as a kind of bonus tour. 12/10, 100% recommend
Written September 7, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Expediciones A
So grateful for your visit and your amazing vibes Joshua, it was a pleasure to have this sand experience with you and live the desert of Lomas de Ancon. We hope to see you next time. Take care :)
